Articles.Content:
I punch legoclone off the hill.

My hill.
I revert physics to 0.17 and kill you with Magic Boulder. Hill protected by Krakens around Magic Boulder

I step onto your hill. my mere presence kills the kraken and tames the magic boulder. You get crushed by the magic boulder. My hill (and magic boulder, and a spaceplaneAddict squashed into strawberry jam.)
I slink up in a submarine and pound you with nuclear missiles. My irradiated hill+magic boulder.

I make you lithobrake into the Magic Boulder**TM**, causing your face to combust into MOAR BOOSTERS. I turn the boosters into MOAR MISSLES. Grabbing a gas mask, I now sit at the center of the hill, in the centre of the MBoulder, guarded by Jeb and Booster Missles. Did I meantion they were black hole augmented?

Uhh... I put them in a gray hole. My hill.

I doubt that even exists...

I slap you.

My hill.

Your hill

JK, MY HILL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
My hill.

I know.

Get off my hill you idiot.

Everyone besides me gets teleported into the most dangerous part of the planet Mustafar.

My hill.

the most dangerous place is standing at the foot of the hill

i run up to the hill and punch UnionPacific1938WP  **IN THE FACE** 

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-25T15:24:00Z" title="09/25/2015 03:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 25, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**

I kick you off.

My hill.

I use sparta kick.

My hill.

And I surround it with giant death robots.

I use MLG hacker skills.

I drop kick you off the hill. (Starving Games)

My hill.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/esE_uA-XkJ8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And then I plant brussel sprouts, deterring further attackers.
I love eathing brussel sprouts (seriously, in real life i do like them a LOT). I eat them all and bury you. My hill with Brezhnev reference.

I return from underground and shoot you.

My hill...

I bang you head repeatedly with a well polished shoe made in Soviet Russia. (the shoe may or may not belong to Khrushchev) You die under the supreme might of the Politburo. I claim the hill for interstellar communism. my (and the soviets') hill (and shoe)

I'm deathless and an interstellar capitalist.

My hill and shoe.
I throw you into the gulag. my hill

I fly out mof the gulag and throw you in there.

MY hill...
true soviets cannot be locked in gulag. I crash through with a KV2 and derp a 152mm high explosive shell into you. my hill.

I eat it and burp it up on top of you.

My hill with a dead, exploded body.
the tank kills you as the ghost of stalin pilots it. His hill
